sourcesContent:
Videos

{{ video.title }}

{{ video.description | slice:0:160 }}...

import { AfterViewInit, Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Video } from 'src/app/interfaces/video.model'; import { VideoService } from 'src/app/services/video.service'; declare var bootstrap: any; // Declare bootstrap to access tooltip @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit, AfterViewInit { videos: Video[] = []; serverUrl = 'http://127.0.0.1:8080/'; videoFilePath = ''; constructor(private videoService: VideoService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.videoService.getAllVideos().subscribe((data) => { this.videos = data.map(video => ({ ...video, thumbnail: this.serverUrl + 'Thumbnails/' + video.thumbnail, })); }); } ngAfterViewInit(): void { // Initialize Bootstrap tooltips const tooltipTriggerList = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-bs-toggle="tooltip"]')); tooltipTriggerList.forEach(tooltipTrigger => { new bootstrap.Tooltip(tooltipTrigger); }); } showTooltip(event: MouseEvent): void { const tooltip = bootstrap.Tooltip.getInstance(event.target as HTMLElement); if (tooltip) { tooltip.show(); } } hideTooltip(event: MouseEvent): void { const tooltip = bootstrap.Tooltip.getInstance(event.target as HTMLElement); if (tooltip) { tooltip.hide(); } } }
